89  void fill_log_frame(Packet::LogFrame* log_frame) {
90  log_frame->MergeFrom(log_frame_);
91  reset_log_frame();
92  }
93 
97  Packet::DebugRobotPath* add_debug_path() {
98  return log_frame_.add_debug_robot_paths();
99  }
100 
101 private:
102  void reset_log_frame() {
103  log_frame_.Clear();
104  for (const QString& string : debug_layers_) {
105  log_frame_.add_debug_layers(string.toStdString());
106  }
107  }
109  int num_debug_layers_;
110 
112  QMap<QString, int> debug_layer_map_;
113 
115  QStringList debug_layers_;
116 
117  Context* context_;
118 
119  // Keep an entire log frame, but only fill the parts related to debug
120  // drawing. Then we can use protobuf's merge functionality to merge it into
121  // the main log frame.
122  Packet::LogFrame log_frame_;
123 };
